blogPost.title: Buy and hold is one of the dumbest investment strategies ever that also happens to have the highest probability of success for the vast majority of investors
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 买入并持有是史上最愚蠢的投资策略之一，也恰恰是绝大多数投资者成功概率最高的策略。
買入並持有是史上最愚蠢的投資策略之一，也恰恰是絕大多數投資者成功概率最高的策略。
